name: International Flight Services Association
goal: International Flight Services Association (IFSA) is a global professional association representing the interests of airline and railway personnel, inflight and rail caterers and suppliers responsible for providing onboard passenger services on regularly scheduled travel routes. It is a non-profit trade association that monitors American and EU legislative issues of relevance to its members, participates in public consultations, identifies potential conflicts and delivers common positions. IFSA is dedicated to promoting food safety in the onboard services industry.
interests: Food Safety, Public Health, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Regulation (EU) No 1169/2011 Food Information to Consumers, Food Contact Materials, Single Use Plastics Directive
